text: The Gaboon worm lizard (Monopeltis jugularis) is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is found in Gabon, Equatorial Guinea, and Cameroon. ==References== Category:Monopeltis Category:Lizards of Africa Category:Reptiles of Cameroon Category:Reptiles of Equatorial Guinea Category:Reptiles of Gabon Category:Reptiles described in 1880 Category:Taxa named by Wilhelm Peters
title: Gaboon worm lizard
